name: Do you believe in love after life?
name_original: Do you believe in love after life?
description:
Note: Web version is very buggy and is recommended to just download the game

This is Do you believe in Love after Life DEMO!

A game that makes you wonder "Is there love in the afterlife?" (Warning: does not actually make you wonder)

You are a recently deceased person, who meets new people in the afterlife! Make friends, make connections, perhaps make relationships? 

Though feel free to do all of those with the current 9 ghosties!
